page.title: 01INTRODUCTION.
page.content: Alnwick is the major The town and administrative centre of this area .It is situated just off the A.1.approximately 35 miles north of Newcastle upon tyne and 35 miles south of the Scottish border .It is steeped in history,and the town centre has been declared a special conservation area because of its importance.The Market Place has a Saturday Market and is used for specified events at various times throughout the year.Examples being the International Folk Festival-usually in the second week of August ;and Alnwick Fair which is one of the most important tourist attractions in the area .On the last Sunday in June each year the local folk dress up in period costumes and step back through time as they re-enact for some seven days,the town,s ancient Fair.The Bellman leads
